long_description: The compact and powerful SureFire G2X(TM) Pro flashlight uses a high-efficiency LED to output a brilliant 320-lumen beam that will light up the darkest trails. Flashlight also operates on a 15-lumen low setting that greatly extends the life of the batteries. 2 CR123A lithium batteries (included) provide up to 2 hrs. of use on high and 45 hrs. of use on low. Press tailcap switch for momentary on in the low setting and press it farther to click into constant on; return to off, and then click the switch again to enter high setting. Coated, impact-resistant polycarbonate window protects lens and emitter, and helps maximize light output. Rugged Nitrolon(R) polymer body and aluminum bezel resist crushing, bending and corrosion. O-ring and gasket keep moisture out of the SureFire G2X Pro flashlight.
